title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, September 17, 2021
description: Today is the birthday of poet William Carlos Williams (1883) who said, “A poem is a complete little universe.” We feature his poem “Pastoral.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of poet William Carlos Williams (1883) who said, “A poem is a complete little universe.” We feature his poem “Pastoral.”
